name: appwrite
description: Appwrite is a secure, open-source backend server that provides auth, file storage, databases, functions, and realtime APIs. It powers web, mobile, and Flutter apps and supports self-hosting with Docker and Kubernetes.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Complete backend solution for web, mobile, and Flutter apps. Everything you need

features.title: User Management
features.description: Built-in user management with multiple auth methods. Secure and simple

features.title: High Performance
features.description: NoSQL database with real-time subscriptions and queries. Fast and flexible

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Secure file upload, storage, and delivery with image manipulation. Media made easy

features.title: Cloud Functions
features.description: Run serverless functions in multiple languages. Extend functionality

features.title: REST API
features.description: WebSocket support for live data updates. Instant synchronization

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Full control with Docker and Kubernetes deployment. Your backend, your rules
